alert.note: Alert for Gallatin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:18PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Gallatin County through 345 PM MDT... At 317 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southeast of Bozeman, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Gallatin County. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 317 and 321. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for south central Montana.
